[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The ALFRED System (AS) defines requirements for assisting older persons and caregivers in daily activities, health monitoring, and social interaction.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: AS supports speech-based commands, wearable devices, health tracking, and personalized assistance.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: AS integrates with health sensors, IoT devices, and APIs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: AS provides speech recognition, visual aids, and wearable controls.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: AS operates on smartphones, tablets, and wearable devices.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: AS supports APIs for app integration and data exchange.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: AS ensures secure data transmission and alerts.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: AS optimizes real-time health tracking and interaction logs.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: AS ensures continuous availability with energy-efficient processing.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: AS supports multilingual configurations and accessibility preferences.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: AS links to repositories, cloud storage, and third-party applications.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: AS facilitates health tracking, social interaction, emergency alerts, and reminders.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: AS serves older persons, caregivers, and healthcare professionals.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: AS depends on IoT devices, network availability, and sensor compatibility.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: AS requires compliance with healthcare regulations and reliable IoT connectivity.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Session: Interaction with AS for health monitoring.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with health sensors and IoT devices for real-time monitoring.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall provide APIs for third-party applications and data exchange.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-003: The system shall enable secure caregiver communication for health alerts (REQ-DSGN-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall support speech-based commands for interaction and reminders.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall track health metrics, including vitals and activity logs (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall provide emergency call and fall detection features (REQ-DSGN-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-004: The system shall offer personalized app suggestions based on user behavior.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide high-contrast UI and large-button navigation.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process speech commands without significant delay.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support up to roughly a thousand concurrent users.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store user health data securely with access controls.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall maintain logs of app interactions and alerts.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with GDPR for data privacy and protection.
[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-002: The system shall encrypt all communications and stored data.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to ISO standards for healthcare and medical devices.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall enforce role-based access control.
[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall ensure nearly always uptime.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Speech recognition accuracy tests, health tracking validation, emergency alert response validation, and API integration testing.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: System architecture diagrams, API references, and compliance reports.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR, IoT security frameworks, and ISO healthcare standards.
